survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and challenges of hybrid learning models from the perspective of students, focusing on engagement, technology use, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the hybrid learning model (combination of in-person and online classes)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and simplicity. Ensure the scale is balanced with clear labels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the hybrid learning model (combination of in-person and online classes)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of hybrid learning do you find most challenging? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Technical issues (e.g., poor internet connection, software problems)
Difficulty staying engaged during online sessions
Lack of face-to-face interaction with instructors
Time management between online and in-person sessions
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture overlapping challenges. Include an 'Other' option for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of hybrid learning do you find most challenging? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Technical issues (e.g., poor internet connection, software problems)
Difficulty staying engaged during online sessions
Lack of face-to-face interaction with instructors
Time management between online and in-person sessions

questions.question_text: What improvements would enhance your hybrid learning experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses by making the text box large enough.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input. No predefined options.

script.question_text: What improvements would enhance your hybrid learning experience?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties during online sessions?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to quantify technical issues. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical difficulties during online sessions?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that hybrid learning provides an equitable education compared to traditional in-person learning?
questions.client_notes: Include a neutral option ('Unsure') to accommodate respondents who may not have a strong opinion.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.
